Judul: ASSESSING ORGANIZATIONAL CULTURE IN SCHOOL OF BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT BANDUNG INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY
Abstrak:
The model used in this research in assessing the organizational culture is Denison Organizational Culture Model which introduced by Denison in 1990. This model has 4 cultural traits (adaptability, mission, consistency involvement)   

each culture trait has 3 indices. In gathering the data, the researcher spread 45   

Denison organizational culture survey questionnaires to get the existing culture.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Yuni Ros Bangun, MBA.
Kata Kunci: Organization Culture, Denison Organizational Culture Survey
